channel.title: ~urgent please help~client error~
channel.description:
Hey guys... i have a client error.. i am using the pulsepk 517 client, it was all working perfectly fine ive been on all day, i finally figured out how to make a run.bat for windows 7 and vista and it was working. so i went to upload the client on mediafire and closed the server. i went back to it about 5 mins later and i try to run the client and i get this error on all 3 runs.. windows 7, vista and xp..... :/
The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
ive seen it before but i cannot figure out whats wrong. hopefully its an easy fix.... So if anyone can help me out i would really appreciate it.. thank you -- william
You can also email me at Im_oh_fasho@yahoo.com if you know how to fix this problem - i will give you free donator or mod on my server.........

item.title: ~urgent please help~client error~
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

Hey guys… i have a client error… i am using the pulsepk 517 client, it was all working perfectly fine ive been on all day, i finally figured out how to make a run.bat for windows 7 and vista and it was working. so i went to upload the client on mediafire and closed the server. i went back to it about 5 mins later and i try to run the client and i get this error on all 3 runs… windows 7, vista and xp…

The system cannot find the path specified.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

ive seen it before but i cannot figure out whats wrong. hopefully its an easy fix…
So if anyone can help me out i would really appreciate it…
thank you – william

You can also email me at Im_oh_fasho@yahoo.com if you know how to fix this problem - i will give you free donator or mod on my server…
